gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Knicks 112, Trail Blazers 84
gameRecap.excerpt: The Knicks defeat the Trail Blazers, 112-84.  OG Anunoby (23 points, four rebounds, four 3PM) and Julius Randle (20 points, seven rebounds, eight assists) combined for 43 points for the Knicks in the victory, while Jerami Grant tallied 21 points for the Trail Blazers in the losing effort.  The Knicks have won their fifth consecutive game and improve to 22-15 on the season, while the Trail Blazers fall to 10-26.
